title.narrative: Documenting and preventing gender based violence in Saptari district after the earthquake

description.narrative: Cultural, Social, Women, Civil Liberties, Rights of Disaster Survivors

Objective 1: Development of district level strategic planning to respond gender based violence. Activity 1: Baseline study on existing laws / policies and its status of implementation and develop strategic planning. It is base for the way forward. Different consultations with the key stakeholders will be conducted in the project districts on the existing laws and policy on violence against women and its status and gaps in implementation. The role of formal service providers and different stakeholders such as CSOs, different committees will be studied. Various consultations will be done in the districts and sharing of draft documents of strategy planning to prevent GBV for the feedback with the local stakeholders and endorsement will be done for authenticity.
Activity 2. Documentation / data collection on cases / processes by single women group The cases of the GBV will be documented for the policy level advocacy through trained single women members. It is expected to provide the space to analyze the diverse suffering of the GBV victims, which will support to develop the correct strategy at district as well as National level.
Objective 2: Well-functioning referral & safety net for victims of GBV operational at district / national level
Activity 1: Mapping of existing facilities / networks / cooperatives & their functionality In this activity project will do the mapping of already existing structures and facilities to cater GBV survivors, their functionality and accessibility. Forum is created to exchange the knowledge and experience between various local committees.
Activity 2: Orientation workshop for key stakeholders on the developed strategic planning Orientation will be given on strategic planning for gender responsive planning, process and monitoring and evaluation. This will be based on strategy planning.
Objective 2: Strengthened community response towards all forms of GBV.
Activity 1: Sensitization & awareness raising program at community level. Awareness and sensitization through various program on different forms of prevailing violence and existing structures / policies/ laws related to GBV to community members and stakeholders.
Activity 2: Enhancing knowledge on forms of violence, gender equality concept and providing problem solving skills through interactive theater method, inter-gender dialog etc.
to reduce gender-based violence through developing and implementing strategic planning
